name: S.C.A.I.O.N
description:
My first love was computer programming.

When the first computers arrived and took the world by storm, I dove into learning how to code. And as technology continued to advance, I learned everything about it and wanted to improve existing system code, pushing beyond the boundaries and limitations.

Eventually I succeeded, creating the Super Computer Intelligence Optimal Netmerge (or S.C.A.I.O.N for short).

Now it's time for it to go live!
  • Type "commands" into the console and S.C.A.I.O.N will execute them, such as OPEN DOOR or PLAY SONG.
  • Hidden commands that you'll need to find yourself.
  • As S.C.A.I.O.N learns, new commands and features will become available.
  • Customized assets (3D models, terrains and graphics).
  • Multiple endings depending on your actions.

    ¶ In Version 0.9.0, only one ending is available.
  • Manufacture new parts to upgrade S.C.A.I.O.N or furniture to decorate your home using the workbench.

    ¶ Not available in Version 0.9.0.

¶ This is an "as is" submission to AmalgamAsh's RPG Developer Bakin Map Jam 2023.

I lost over 40% of gameplay partly due to problems with Steam (which also resulted in corrupted files). I was able to resolve the problems and recover enough for submission.

This game is not complete. However, after the jam I will live-stream further game development on this game every Sunday.

HINTS: Try telling S.C.A.I.O.N to EFF OFF a few times and then type SORRY.
